string.text: For now our secret stash is in the tunnel. That's a good place - few know about it, and the anomalies will keep others from getting in.
Seriy's secret stash
I hid it in the stump by the tunnel. There's a good hole there.
Stump with hole
I buried some goodies under the cross by the bush.
The mark is under the cross
They were shooting. Had to drop the backpack under the train car behind the seat. At least I got away. I'll go back and get it.
Drunkard's backpack
In the chest under the stairs there's a secret stash.
Chest in the stairwell
I hid it in the chest, nobody will check anyway.
Factory chest
I found a safe under a fallen tree. Going to hide everything there for now.
Safe under the tree
The goods are in the old pipe, we'll have to tell the guys that. I'm not climbing in there.
Radioactive pipe
There is a half buried safe under the bush - that's where I hide everything.
Safe under the bush
They discovered the chest under the support beam. Someone was dragging it along all the way from Scientific Research Institute. Let's wait for the windflier and then pick it up.
Archive box
Good chest for collecting extra junk
Chest from the institute
Hid it in the safe, but then the soldiers came and now I can't get the goods.
Agrosafe
Good chest for collecting extra junk. The institute's equipment inventory was once there.
Zavhoz chest
Good chest for small things. I kept my metalworking instruments in a chest like that at home.
Metalworking inventory
I hid the backpack by the Duty base. Will pick it up later
Hidden backpack
A large pack of dogs went after me. If I didn't leave my backpack I wouldn't have made it to the gate
The backpack that was left behind
Everything that was left they buried under the cross
Secret stash under the cross
Dropped my backpack here - it'll be easier that way
Backpack
Ammo of the Duty's security checkpoint is stored in a bunker, but nobody's keeping an eye on the chest
Supplies in the bunker
I saw how a dutyer stuck something in the pipe by the gate
Secret stash
All of this belonged to him, might as well stay here for the time being
Secret stash under the cross
I'm going to the bar, left the backpack in the hangar
Backpack
They say that there's something valuable hidden on the Duty's territory in the switchboard.
Swithboard with a secret stash
I stuck the chest in top of the tower in front of the Duty - no one will notice it
Secret stash on the tower
Hid it in the pipe under the stairs
Secret stash

Hid the goods not far from the bar, behind the anomalies - nobody will get in there. And even if they got there they wouldn't know how to open it. But it's all very simple - just pull up slightly at the door, and everything will open.
Arny's secret stash
Buried the goods not far from the bar
Secret stash
By the bar, in a chest
Chest
Hid the chest on a side-street by the bar
Small chest
Buried it under the cross behind the pine trees
Secret stash
Under the cross, not far from the passage into the Dark Territory
Secret stash
Hid the chest with the antirad in a pipe by the Arena
Small chest
Hid my crap in a pipe under the tower
Secret stash
There's a secret stash under the cross
Secret stash
When my comrades and I were fighting off the dogs in uniform, I buried some goods under the bridge. Let them stay there for now.
Under the cross
Found out from Lihoi that the secret stash is in the cellar. He was talking too much so we shut him up for good.
Cellar in the village
They saw that the commander has a tricky chest in his office, and there's a ton of valuable goods there.
The valuables of the commander
The goodies are hidden in the bandits' cellar. They weren't there before so let's wait for the right time to take them all.
The robbers' cellar
I saw how a bandit hid his goods in a chest in the hangar. How can I quietly steal it?
Bandits' storage
The head of radio communications passed along a message to us: retreat. I found a chest, threw in what I had on me, and retreated empty-handed.
Supplies in the chest
While the dutyers were shooting, I hid the habar in the train car. Somehow I have to get in to pick it up. And to thank the Duty.
Chest at the heavily armed military checkpoint
Barely made it under the beams, but at least the backpack's well hidden - nobody will try to climb in here.
The extra cash is under the concrete blocks
Stuck my backpack into the furnace, it'll come in handy later.
Furnace secret stash
Hid the goodies in the car in the abandoned village.
Auto-secret stash
Hid away the backpack with the equipment in a cozy spot.
Backpack with equipment
A helicopter fell right by the abandoned military base, and the chest is right there, under the helicopter. One problem - there are anomalies and radiation all over the place.
Chest from the helicopter
Left the backpack in the cabin of the crane. Will pick it up later
Secret stash of the high altitude worker
Good chest for storing extra junk
Chest with goods
Threw the goods into the chest - will get them later
Temporary secret stash
Hid the goodies in the car right under the Freedom noses, didn't have any time to look for a better place
Secret stash in the car
They say that some famous stalker kicked the bucket here, and nobody's picked up his goods yet
Things of the dead stalker
They say that there's a chest in the garage with a whole ton of goodies
Treasure in the garage
They say there's a chest in the kindergarten with a whole ton of goodies in it
Old secret stash
They buried Fang in Pripyat under a monument. They left all of his goodies with him - it's not right to take away from the dead.
Fang's goodies

The last that they knew about him is that he was the sole survivor after the scorcher. He left all the supplies in some old supermarket, and moved on out. Everything went not the way it was planned, and that was the best leader of Freedom in all of our history.
Supplies of the leader of Freedom
The cross is on the way to the scorcher, didn't go any further, hid everything there under it.
Murk's treasure
Some stalker perished here, and his goodies are still lying around, nobody can get to them
Goodies of the dead stalker
They say that there's a half-buried safe in the forest and there's a bunch of goodies inside
Goodies in the safe

They told them not to fly over the Scorcher, and look what happend. They landed in the middle of the forest, and it's unlikely that anyone survived. We were supposed to get the stuff that was with them.
Package for Duty

They say that the supplies of the faction, who were trying to get to the center of the Zone, are still under the radiation of the Scorcher. None of them returned, and the supplies remained there waiting for someone to pick them up.
Supplies of the reckless group
They say that the leader of some former faction croaked here, and there was a valuable amount of goodies with him
Goodies of the leader of former faction
Hid the backpack behind the iron plate
Hidden backpack
Stashed the goodies under the cross
Secret stash under the cross
Hid a little something in the chest under the little house. Shouldn't forget about it.
Chest under the small house
I was about to stick the backpack under the steps, when those jerks appeared. Man, how will I get it back?
Stalker's backpack
There's a half buried safe in the corner behind the tree. That's where all my junk will be for now.
Secret stash behind the tree
They hid everything in a chest in the garage that they took over during the rain.
Secret stash in the garage
Hid some things in the chest behind the booth
Hidden chest
Stuck the backpack in a hole. Seems unnoticeable from above.
Backpack in the secret stash
Hid the small chest in a safe spot
Chest in a safe spot
My backpack is up right under the roof. It's there for a rainy day.
Secret stash of the stalker
They say there's a safe in that little house, and that there's something in it
Safe in the house
Hid it in the house in a pipe. Careful, everything's out of whack there
Secret stash in the pipe
Take what we talked about from the chest. Usually nobody looks in there
Hidden chest
Hid it under the cross on a side street
Secret stash under the cross
They hid the extra supplies under the concrete at the construction site
Secret stash under the concrete
In case we need to take off quickly, we'll put the habar into the chest at the construction site.
Secret stash of the Lucky One
Hid it in one of the side streets at the construction site
Nychka
Stuck everything into some pipe - will pick it up later
Secret stash in the pipe
Hid the medicine in a chest not far from the construction site
Chest with medicine
Dragged the chest into the cabin of the crane
Chest in the crane
Hid my goods in a manhole in the corner.
Secret stash in the manhole
Went after the artifact and got into an anomaly. I was barely able to walk and dropped the backpack in the corner.
The dropped backpack
Stuck the chest right under the roof by the tower so that nobody would notice.
Small chest under the roof
We hid what we found in the pipe not far from the construction site.
Secret stash in the pipe
Dropped the backpack off by the crane
Backpack
Stuck all the goods into the log. Don't think they'll find it.
Secret stash
Threw my things into the pipe. Will pick them up later.
Secret stash in the pipe
Put the chest into the secret stash - it's a reliable place
Chest in the secret stash
Left the backpack in an abandoned building. Good, nobody's around.
The left-behind backpack
Stuck the goodies in a nondescript chest. Will get them later
Nondescript chest
Hid the goodies in the car right under the bandits' noses, didn't have any time to look for a better place
Secret stash in the car
Stashed away the goodies behind the garages
Backpack behind the garages
Hid away the bacpack in a booth, right behind the iron scrap
Backpack with the loot
The goodies are hidden in the car not far from the territory. The radiation is not very high.
The loot is in the car
They say there's somebody's goodies there, but they can't get to it because of the radiation.
Old backpack
They say that here there's a secret stash of some grouping. I only wonder how they got here with the radiation?
Secret stash of a grouping

Another volunteer stalker croaked because another prototype didn't protect him from the radiation. He only made it to the middle of the territory, and stayed there. Saharov wants to take more precise measurements, but I won't go, else I'll end up staying there myself, not far from the territory.
Backpack of the tester
They say that there is somebody's habar, but there's no way to get there because of the radiation.
Old secret stash
They say that there's somebody's safe here, but there's no way to get to it because of the radiation.
Chest with goods
Everything is in the chest, in a train car not far from the base. That's how we planned it, now all we have to do is wait.
The agreed-upon secret stash
Put the chest into the bus - seems to be unnoticeable
Secret stash in the bus
Found some cartriges in the electricity room
Secret stash in the electricity room
Hid the backpack under a pine tree
Secret stash under the pine tree
There is a safe partially buried in a pile of trash. Everything's in the safe. Better not forget what was in it.
Safe in the South pile.
There's a secret stash in the shadows - a good place to hide it.
Rotted stump
An anomaly got someone by the escalator - the backpack is in view, but hard to get to.
Under the dipper
Left the backpack in the radiation ruins. Was afraid to show my face there.
Dangerous secret
Hid it in the car, the Long One said it was a good place.
Secret stash in the car
Hid the backpack under the car, nobody will bother looking there
Hidden backpack
Put the chest into the car by the swamp
Car with the secret stash
Hid my crap in the car on a hill
Secret stash on a hill

Gotta take off. Saharov and Kruglov are total psychos - they want me to go with some stalker into the center of radiation. Screw them, as soon as I gather all the supplies in the manhole, I'm taking off.
Secret stash of the scientist
Had to leave the backpack
The left-behind backpack

The newbie ended up stealing the chest from the bandits. He put it into the Niva which turned up side down. He says that by the looks of it, it's a government chest. We'll have to arm our guys and take it.
Government chest
We left everything that we found in the chest, we'll pick it up when we're returning
Secret stash in the chest
Someone's backpack is lying around in the valley, with anomalies all around. How could you get to it?
Nobody's backpack
Threw my junk in the pipe - will get it later.
The body of the truck
Stuck the goods in a log, don't think they'll find it.
Treasure in a log
There's a secret stash in a stump - good place for it
Secret stash in a stump
Take the things from the rotted log
Rotted log
There's some chest in the car at the bandits' camp. We need to sneak into the car and check it out - I feel there's something in there
Chest in the car
Good chest for storing extra junk
Good supply chest
Hid the junk in the office of KAMAZ
Secret stash in KAMAZ
Hid the backpack of the newbie, and he never found it
Hidden backpack
There are robberies everywhere. They're even stealing even from their own... but they'll never find my chest
Chest
Hid my things in an iron capsule
Secret stash of the stalker
I threw the things into the pipe, will get them later. I had to, otherwise I would have obviously taken them along. Just hope they don't get wet.
Things in the pipe
There's a secret stash in the stump - a good place
Secret stump
Threw the backpack under a tree. Otherwise, I wouldn't have escaped the bandits.
Stalker's backpack
The chest was left in the van - needs to be picked up
Forgotten chest
Everything I stole from Borov I hid away in a safe under the pine tree. Now I have to wait it out while they finish freaking out.
Hidden safe
